The setting at the Inn allows for casual interaction with people from different walks of life, so Bianca's approach would balance professionalism and personal connection.She needs to sound determined yet reasonable. Mentioning specific trade issues (like dwindling goods) shows her observant trait while subtly putting Vincenzzo in his place as a commoner who might not have the same resources but could be more practical.
